ingredients: 1   +   3/4 cups quick cooking oats, 1   +   3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 1 cup butter, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups dates, pitted and chopped,   +   1/2 cup water,   +   1/2 cup white sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 207mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 33g 12%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 2g, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 126mg 3%
